channel.title: Halo 3
channel.description:
Don't know if I can post this :|
What are your thoughts? I thought it would be pretty epic. But it's not near it's lived up to be.
If you're wondering, I uhm.. Get games for.. "free" ;D
And I got Halo 3, I think it comes out this Saturday?
But yeah, I just played it. Got a little bit into the campaign. Just a few minutes. It's not all it's cracked up to be for me. I guess the graphics are good, but it still just reminds me of Halo, nothing more. I guess maybe it's just that I haven't played that far into it.
So yeah. Hopefully all you kids who preordered it will love it a lot more.
If you guys want pictures as proof or anything like that I'll show some.

But he said its awesome and I seen the pics and a movie of him playing it. since I met him on Halo 2 Xbox live I couldn’t see it in person.

item.title: Halo 3
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Well, my friend played the beta, and he said all the weapons have been tweaked so it’s fair. He also said that you could record your gameplay, and watch it later, don’t know if it’s true though. I never really had a thing for Halo, mainly racing games are for me.

item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

its gonna be epic and i pro ordered it.

and master chief might die and[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:2, topic:145037”]Too much hype for what it really is. The graphics don’t much differ from 2, and the guns have only been tweaked slightly, with the addition of some new ones. The online mode hasn’t changed greatly (mainly because it was such a success from the beginning). The one player game story has been made to be appealing, from what I’ve heard. I don’t care about Halo 3…[/quote]
where have you been chris?
